location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Memorandum of a Letter from Colonel Stannus to His Highness the Imam of Muscat

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top right corner of the page. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right corner, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.Condition: The item has suffered from insect damage and is difficult to read in places as part of the text is missing.

mods.abstract: Summary account of a letter stating Stannus' apprisal of Shaikh Mahomed that he will no longer interfere regarding any hostile intentions, and will not accept His Highness's terms.
